Steele</H1> <IMG SRC="goldRule.gif" width =100%> <P> <EM> Associate Professor of Computer Sciences and Director of the University Computing Center (1963)</EM><P> <EM> M.S., Purdue University, 1965.</EM><P> John Steele's research interests are in the areas of computer data communications and computer circuits and systems.<P> Projects: <A HREF=AR95Book-82.html>Crosspoint Project</A><P> <A HREF="http://www.cs.purdue.edu/people/jms">Steele's home page </A><P> <IMG SRC="goldRule.gif" width =100%> <ADDRESS>CS Annual Report - 19 APR 1996</ADDRESS> <A HREF="AR95Book-42.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bnext.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-40.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bprev.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-6.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bup.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-1.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Btop.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-2.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bcontent.gif"></A><BR><A HREF="AR95Book-42.html">[Next] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-40.html">[Previous] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-6.html">[Up] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-1.html">[Top] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-2.html">[Contents]</A> <P> </BODY> </HTML> </HTML>
